page.title: 03FREE TIME SURVEY IN BUNGAY.
page.content: Following a survey of how people spend their leisure time we discovered that the majority of activities are undertaken in Bungay,the most popular of these being visiting friends and drinking.Many people enjoy home-based activities such as watching television, reading and gardening.Some people travel outside Bungay for swimming.It was felt that Bungay needs a swimming pool.Generally it was thought there was enough to do for young people.Most people asked,thought that old people interests were taken notice of. Bungay Sports Hall was added to Bungay High School in 1979.Basketball,soccer and cricket are a few activities which are played there.Several clubs use the hall in the evening and at weekends including the Black dog Badminton and Running clubs.
